ARABIC: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for those who after that make tawba and put things right. Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except those who repent after this and reform; and God is surely forgiving and kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except those who repent and reform themselves; Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except that of those who afterwards repent and reform themselves; God is All-forgiving and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except those who repent after this and reform themselves; so indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except those who repent thereafter and do righteous deeds; (for such) verily, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except those who repent after this and act aright, for surely Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save such as repent thereafter and make amends; surely God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save those who afterward repent and make amends. (For such) lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: save those who afterwards repent and make amends, for truly God is forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Excepting those who thereafter shall repent and make amends. Verily Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: excepting those who repent after that and reform, for Allah is indeed all-forgiving, all-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Unless they repent thereafter and mend (their conduct); for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except those who repent thereafter and do righteous deeds, (for such) verily, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except those among them that afterwards repent and mend their ways. Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for those who repent afterwards, and reform; for God is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:5] except those who repent thereafter and make amends, in their deeds, for God is indeed Forgiving, of their [unsubstantiated] accusations, Merciful, to them, in inspiring them to make repentance whereby their immorality is curbed and their testimony becomes [once again] acceptable — some say, however, that it can never be accepted [thereafter], if the proviso is taken to refer to the last clause.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save those who afterward repent) after their slander (and make amends) between themselves and their Lord. ((For such) lo! Allah is Forgiving) He forgives whoever repents, (Merciful) He bestows mercy upon whoever dies repentant. This verse was revealed about 'Abdullah Ibn Ubayy and his host.
